text: Samuud deqsita marah ken toobokoyta Nabii Saalih rubne, tokkel usuk keenik :yi maraw Yalla dubuk uqbuda kaak sa cakkil taqbuden Yalla mantoonuk, kaa kinni qimbok baaxok sin gintem sin abba kinni Nabii Aadam burtak gineemil, tet xisaah teetil dabqah gaca mara sin abek, toysa usuk dambi siinih cabam kaal esserita, tohuk lakal kay amri oggolak kaal gaca, diggah yi Rabbi qibaada kaah caglise maral xayiih kaa xaaqiteenik dooqa keenik oggolah keenik iyye
